Magazine Officer Job at Solar Nigachem Limited




        
    

        
        Solar Nigachem stands out as a reliable and trustworthy partner. Our unparalleled expertise, commitment to safety, cutting-edge technology, and customer-centric approach makes us a go-to provider for the following sectors, Mining, road construction, Defense projects, Quarries, Seismic Exploration, Tunneling, Hydro Projects and all others - our customized solutions and exceptional customer support ensure that our clients receive the highest level of assistance and satisfaction. With Solar Nigachem, mining operations can rely on their explosives to enhance productivity, efficiency, and safety, ultimately contributing to the success and sustainability of the mining industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

            
    



Job Position: Magazine Officer

Job Location: Obafemi Owode, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Manage the receipt, storage, issuance, and return of explosives in line with statutory and company requirements.
	Maintain accurate stock records, registers, and inventory reports for all explosives.
	Ensure compliance with government regulations (e.g.,Ministry of Mines & Steel Development, and other regulatory agencies).
	Monitor magazine security and safety standards, ensuring only authorized personnel access restricted areas.
	Conduct regular inspections of magazine facilities to ensure safety, housekeeping, and compliance with explosive storage regulations.
	Collaborate with production and operations teams to meet material requirements without compromising safety.
	Prepare and submit statutory returns and reports as required by regulatory authorities.
	Support audits, risk assessments, and emergency drills related to magazine operations.
	Maintain a secure, compliant, and organized facility.


Qualifications & Requirements


	Minimum of B.Sc. in Accounting, Business Administration, and any relevant social science course.
	At least 3 to 5years of experience in magazine operations, explosives handling, or similar role within a manufacturing or mining environment.
	Knowledge of explosives regulations and safety standards in Nigeria is an added advantage.
	Strong organizational, record-keeping, and compliance monitoring skills.
	Ability to work independently, with high attention to detail and accountability.
	Certification in HSE or Explosives Management will be an added advantage.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Apploication
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: hr@solarnigachem.com.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "IT Support Officer",
  "description": "IPT PowerTech Group delivers specialized solutions to the power, industrial and telecom sectors in the Middle East, Africa and neighboring countries. Since our inception in Lebanon in 1993, we have grown into a leading group, combining power expertise with telecom infrastructure specialization. Today, we are market leaders in providing specialty batteries and power systems, customized energy efficient/ hybrid and renewable energy solutions, in addition to telecom infrastructure and managed services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Support Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Job Type:&nbsp;Full-time

Position Summary


	The IT Support Officer will provide technical support to staff, ensure smooth running of computer systems, and assist with hardware, software, and network troubleshooting.
	The role requires a proactive professional who can resolve issues efficiently while delivering excellent user support.


Qualification


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree / HND in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
	2-3 years of proven experience in IT support, helpdesk, or system administration.
	Professional certifications such as CompTIA At, Network, IT IL, or Microsoft Certified are an added advantage.
	Hands-on experience with hardware maintenance, system installations, and user support.
	Knowledge of cybersecurity best practices will be a plus.


Skills:


	Strong troubleshooting and diagnostic abilities.
